body:
sponeta @ http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=84303#p84294 writes:

Copying any creature or spell that has "shuffle X into owner's library" puts a copy of that card into the library. For example, if I cast Beacon of Unrest and copy it with Twincast, two copies of Beacon of Unrest get added into my library. Same with creatures, like Dread copied with Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Copying any creature or spell that has "shuffle X into owner's library" puts a copy of that card into the library

comments.body:
Revision 03e6b277def1 fixed the issue where a copy of Beacon of Unrest end up in the library.

I can not reproduce this issue with Dread copied with Kiki-Jiki, Mirror Breaker. I end up with only one Dread in the library. This makes sense since MagicFromGraveyardToLibraryTrigger checks for tokens.
